name: Taj Mahal
description: Iconic white marble mausoleum, UNESCO World Heritage site and symbol of eternal love
best_time: October to March, sunrise visits recommended
tips: Visit at sunrise for golden lighting, closed on Fridays, book online to avoid queues

name: Goa Beaches
description: Pristine beaches with vibrant nightlife, water sports, and Portuguese heritage
price: ₹2000-5000 per day including accommodation and food
best_time: November to March for perfect weather
tips: North Goa for parties and nightlife, South Goa for peaceful beaches and relaxation

name: Kerala Backwaters
description: Serene houseboat experience through interconnected waterways in God's Own Country
best_time: September to March for pleasant weather
tips: Book houseboats in advance, try traditional Kerala cuisine, combine with hill stations

name: Rajasthan Palaces
description: Magnificent royal palaces showcasing Rajput architecture and desert culture
best_time: October to March to avoid extreme heat
tips: Stay in heritage hotels, enjoy camel safaris, attend cultural performances
